name: Job-Profile-Project
description: A comprehensive job portal application built using the MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) stack. This application allows users to browse job listings, apply for jobs, and manage their applications seamlessly.

scripts.install-all: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.start: concurrently "npm start --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
